title: FS: 1929 "United Tobacco" Humour in Sport Complete Set
author: Fish

posts.post_title: FS: 1929 "United Tobacco" Humour in Sport Complete Set
posts.post_content:
Hey guys, 

I have the complete set of the 1929 "Humour in Sport" release by South African Cigarette Company "United Tobacco" 

These seem to be extremely rare, as I can't find any comps or hardly any information about them. 

I'm not sure where to price them at, but I'm willing to look at offers! If you are interested or have any questions, please let me know!
